entry.title: Educational Freeware
entry.summary: Here's a site with Educational Freeware, listed by downloadable or online. Most of the downloadable is Windows only, but a few pieces of the software will run inder Linux.
entry.content: Here's a site with Educational Freeware, listed by downloadable or online. Most of the downloadable is Windows only, but a few pieces of the software will run inder Linux.

entry.title: Teacher resources at Education World
entry.summary:
Billed as "The Educator's Best Friend", Education World®, has a ton of resources for teachers and school administration, such as:

  • Lesson Planning
  • Professional Development
  • Administrator's Desk
  • Technology
  • School Issues
  • EdWorld at Home
entry.content:
Billed as "The Educator's Best Friend", Education World®, has a ton of resources for teachers and school administration, such as:

  • Lesson Planning
  • Professional Development
  • Administrator's Desk
  • Technology
  • School Issues
  • EdWorld at Home

entry.title: Free math materials for students, teachers, and parents
entry.summary:
There are free resources for students, teachers, and parents over at Math Goodies.

Math Goodies is a free math help site featuring interactive lessons, puzzles and worksheets. We have provided free homework help since 1999! There are more than 400 pages of activities for students, educators and parents.

They also …
entry.content:
There are free resources for students, teachers, and parents over at Math Goodies.

Math Goodies is a free math help site featuring interactive lessons, puzzles and worksheets. We have provided free homework help since 1999! There are more than 400 pages of activities for students, educators and parents.

They also offer a CD with even more activities for use offline.

entry.title: Google Earth - Available for the Mac or PC
entry.summary:
Google Earth, a free application, allows the user to view in 3D places around the world.

Want to know more about a specific location? Dive right in -- Google Earth combines satellite imagery, maps and the power of Google Search to put the world's geographic information at your fingertips.
entry.content:
Google Earth, a free application, allows the user to view in 3D places around the world.

Want to know more about a specific location? Dive right in -- Google Earth combines satellite imagery, maps and the power of Google Search to put the world's geographic information at your fingertips.

entry.title: The Amazing Flash Card Machine - Online Flash Cards
entry.summary:
Create online flashcards with The Amazing Flash Card Machine - Online Flash Cards:

Welcome to The Amazing Flash Card Machine, an interactive web application that allows the user to create interactive web-based study flash cards.

Students! Create flash cards to help you study for your next exam. Make them publicly available …
entry.content:
Create online flashcards with The Amazing Flash Card Machine - Online Flash Cards:

Welcome to The Amazing Flash Card Machine, an interactive web application that allows the user to create interactive web-based study flash cards.

Students! Create flash cards to help you study for your next exam. Make them publicly available, and your classmates can study from the same set.

Teachers! Create flash card sets for your students. Assign each set of flash cards it's own unique username and password giving your students access to them without having to register.

entry.title: A web based graph creation tool
entry.summary: Need a way to easily create a graph? The National Center for Education Statistics, a division of the U.S. Department of Education has put together an easy to use tool to create bar, line, area, pie, and XY graphs. Users can email the graph to themselves, which will also …
entry.content: Need a way to easily create a graph? The National Center for Education Statistics, a division of the U.S. Department of Education has put together an easy to use tool to create bar, line, area, pie, and XY graphs. Users can email the graph to themselves, which will also give a link to save the graph for 30 days.

entry.title: Fun Friday - Houghton Mifflin Education Place
entry.summary: Houghton Mifflin has several educational games available at Edugames.
entry.content: Houghton Mifflin has several educational games available at Edugames.

entry.title: KidsClick! Web Search
entry.summary:
A search engine geared toward pre-selected kid's sites, KidsClick! Web Search was:

was created by a group of librarians at the Ramapo Catskill Library System, as a logical step in addressing concerns about the role of public libraries in guiding their young users to valuable and age appropriate web sites …
entry.content:
A search engine geared toward pre-selected kid's sites, KidsClick! Web Search was:

was created by a group of librarians at the Ramapo Catskill Library System, as a logical step in addressing concerns about the role of public libraries in guiding their young users to valuable and age appropriate web sites.

entry.title: Student Gallery
entry.summary: Apple has a Student Gallery up that has examples of completed projects using Apple's iLife tools. The Garageband songs sound really, really good. There are examples of music, photos, and movies.
entry.content: Apple has a Student Gallery up that has examples of completed projects using Apple's iLife tools. The Garageband songs sound really, really good. There are examples of music, photos, and movies.
